author: Staff Reporter
text:
The body of a 17-year-old boy, Isaivanan (17) hailing from Manaveli in Puducherry who went missing after he attempted to save three others from Bengaluru, who got caught in the waves in the Chinna Veerampattinam beach, washed ashore at Veerampattinam coast on Monday.

Even as the police were searching for Isaivanan’s body, it washed ashore at Veerampattinam coast on Monday. The body was retrieved and sent for post-mortem to the Puducherry Government General Hospital.
title: Body of missing boy washes ashore
